values: 游；游（某一泳姿）；（鱼等）游动；游泳；游水；横渡（水域）；（比赛中）游过（一段距离或某一水域）；漂浮；使漂浮；（使）在水面上漂荡；眩晕；旋转；晃动；在水中移动
游泳；泳姿；水中嬉戏；（适合钓鱼的静止）深水区；深潭；眩晕感

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 游泳的；游泳用的；善于游泳的；晕眩的

word_group.brief_definition: 游泳；我们游泳去；我去游泳
不自救, 必沉沦；自己努力, 以求生存；不论成败
积极参加当前活动的；合潮流的；识时务的

bilingual.source: I'm not going to swim at the pool.
I'm going to learn how to swim.

list.abstract: Swim（英 [swɪm]，美 [swɪm]），英语单词，作动词为游泳；浸；泡等。作名词为游泳；适合钓鱼的静止深水处；深潭。短语搭配有go swimming（去游泳）。例句有“Adult salmon swim back to the river.（成年鲑鱼游回河里。）” Swim的及物动词近义词有buoy up；名词的近义词有natation、flotage。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, most animals can swim as babies.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很多动物从小就会游泳。

yingyinNormal.en: Nice day for a swim, huh? All right. Bye Mom. Bye Dad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真是游泳的好天气。掰，妈。掰，爸。

yingyinNormal.en: I was looking forward to having a swim. You still can. The sea's not frozen over. Come along, girls.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还盼着可以下去游泳呢。你还是可以游泳的，海水还没结成冰呢。来吧，姑娘们！

yingyinNormal.en: The end of freshman year, I kind of dated the swim team captain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一年级快结束那年，我跟游泳队队长约过会。

yingyinNormal.en: What secret? You know, the one where you can't swim. That's ridiculous.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么秘密? 你不会游泳 有什么大不了。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know. I'm thinking about starting a swim school. Sid's Squids.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想开一家游泳训练班叫“喜德乌贼补习班”。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, that's better. Are you going for a swim, Daddy Pig? Maybe not today.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，舒服多了。你想不想去游泳，猪爸爸？今天就算了吧。

yingyinNormal.en: OK, then. Mummy Pig is going for a swim. Oh ho. Is it cold, mummy? It's a little bit cold.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么好吧。猪妈妈要去游泳了。噢。海水冷不冷，妈妈？是有那么一点冷。

yingyinNormal.en: So beat the bushes. What were Dani Littlejohn's exact movements from her swim until the time of her death?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那就去调查一下，达妮·利特约翰从游泳后到死亡前到底去了哪些地方？

yingyinNormal.en: Tomorrow we're going on a coach trip to the seaside. We can make sand castles. I fancy a swim.
yingyinNormal.zh: 小宝贝们，明天我们要一起坐巴士到海边去。我们可以在海滩上堆沙堡了！我想要去游泳。

yingyinNormal.en: What are you waiting for? Oh, I can't swim because I sprain my ankle. And I think I might have a cough.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们还在等什么呢？噢，我不能游泳，因为我的脚踝扭到了。我好像突然有点咳嗽了。

yingyinNormal.en: The Viking Triathlon. Sixty miles on a bike, 30 miles on foot, and then a nice swim through sub-zero Nordic seas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 维京铁人三项，骑车96公里，跑步48公里，然后在北欧零下几度的海里游泳。

yingyinNormal.en: This does not concern you, kids. And you're lucky I don't tell your parents. You know you can't swim well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这和你们没关系,孩子们，你们很幸运我不会告诉你们的家长，你知道你游泳技术还不行。

yingyinNormal.en: We had to build a pool to swim in the most beautiful bay in the world, the bay which has become dangerous to our health.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们只能在世界上最美的海湾里造泳池游泳，这个海湾已对我们的健康构成了威胁。

yingyinNormal.en: The beach is patrolled year round by bronzed Aussie lifesavers, but always remember to swim between the flags!
yingyinNormal.zh: 海滩全年都有晒得古铜色肌肤的澳洲救生员巡视，不过还请记住要在旗帜之间的安全区域游泳！

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy will have to swim to the shops. Grandpa Pig has arrived on his boat. Ahoy there. Wonderful boating weather. Eh, yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那就只好让爸爸游泳去超市了。猪爷爷开着他的船来到了佩奇的家。你们好啊，今天是适合扬帆的好日子。额，是的。

yingyinNormal.en: Big children don't splash. We are very good at swimming. When George and Richard are older, they'll be able to swim like us, won't they, Rebecca? Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们都不会有那么大的水花。我们游泳游得特别好。等乔治和理查德大一些，他们也会游得像我们那么好。对不对呀，瑞贝卡？没错。

yingyinNormal.en: Have you seen an orange fish swim by?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你见过一条橙色的鱼游过去吗?

yingyinNormal.en: You were about to swim into open water.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要游到海面了。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello. We had a really nice swim. Oh, stop it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好啊。我们游得很开心哦。省省吧。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 模仿你最喜欢的游泳姿势。

word_family.mean: v. 游泳；浸；泡；在眼前旋转；在眼前晃动；横渡；漂浮；使漂浮；使渡过；眩晕

word_usage.usage:
swim可作不及物动词。
示例：I can't swim.
我不会游泳。

swim也可用作及物动词，后接名词或代词作宾语。
示例：How long will it take her to swim the Channel? 
她游过英吉利海峡得用多长时间？

examination_example.sentence: He was fishing while his kids were having a <highlight>swim</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在钓鱼，而他的孩子们在游泳。

examination_example.sentence: It is a good idea to learn to <highlight>swim</highlight>.
When we plan to go <highlight>swimming</highlight>, being safe must come first.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们计划去游泳时，安全必须是第一位的。
